page.title: 16GAMES WE PLAY IN SCHOOL
page.content: In school, we like to play "Please Grandma Grey, may we go out to play?". If the person picked as "Grandma Grey" says 'No' then we keep chanting the song until they change th eir minds.Then we run off shouting "Sh oo!Shoo!".Then "Granny Grey" yells,"Ch ildren" We say "Yes Granny Grey."She t hen asks us where we've been,we reply "To Aunty Mays farm."Granny Grey then asks "What did she give you?"We all si ng,"A bowl of jelly as big as my belly ,a lump of cheese as big as my knees,a nd a teeny weeny sixpence."Granny asks us "Wheres mine?" "Up on the shelf" we all shout,"How do I get it?"she then asks "Climb on the stool"we answer,"Wh at if I fall?"she screams.We all yell "We dont care."Granny Grey then chases after us,and the first one she catches then becomes Granny Grey,and the game then starts all over again. S.D
